participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

poa_nihtb_1_y.Description: I felt attentive (that is, alert or able to pay attention). | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_2_y.Description: I felt delighted. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_3_y.Description: I felt calm. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_4_y.Description: I felt at ease  Definition of At ease: relaxed, comfortable. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_5_y.Description: I felt enthusiastic Definition of enthusiastic: very excited. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_6_y.Description: I felt interested. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_7_y.Description: I felt confident. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_8_y.Description: I felt energetic. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_nihtb_9_y.Description: I felt able to concentrate. | 1 = Not True; 2 = Somewhat True; 3 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

poa_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event-name] = 3_year_follow_up_y_arm_1''''

poa_y_ss_sum.Description: NIH Toolbox Positive Affect; Sum(poa_nihtb_1_y plus poa_nihtb_2_yplus  poa_nihtb_3_y plus poa_nihtb_4_y plus poa_nihtb_5_y plus poa_nihtb_6_y plus  poa_nihtb_7_y plus poa_nihtb_8_y]plus poa_nihtb_9_y); Validation: All items must be answered
